sn3.4:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn3.4:1.3: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn3.4:1.4: ‘kesaṁ nu kho piyo attā, kesaṁ appiyo attā’ti?
sn3.4:1.6: ‘ye ca kho keci kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṁ caranti, manasā duccaritaṁ caranti;
sn3.4:1.9: “piyo no attā”ti, atha kho tesaṁ appiyo attā’.
sn3.4:1.11: Yañhi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, taṁ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:1.13: Ye ca kho keci kāyena sucaritaṁ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṁ caranti, manasā sucaritaṁ caranti;
sn3.4:1.16: ‘appiyo no attā’ti; atha kho tesaṁ piyo attā.
sn3.4:1.18: Yañhi piyo piyassa kareyya, taṁ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.2: Ye hi keci, mahārāja, kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṁ caranti, manasā duccaritaṁ caranti;
sn3.4:2.5: ‘piyo no attā’ti, atha kho tesaṁ appiyo attā.
sn3.4:2.7: Yañhi, mahārāja, appiyo appiyassa kareyya, taṁ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.9: Ye ca kho keci, mahārāja, kāyena sucaritaṁ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṁ caranti, manasā sucaritaṁ caranti;
sn3.4:2.15: Yañhi, mahārāja, piyo piyassa kareyya, taṁ te attanāva attano karonti;
